ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember Dragonrealms. I was thinking just last night that it would be cool if they put more descriptive hit messages in, like DR does. Instead of 47,000
ygData.messageBody:
I remember Dragonrealms. I was thinking just last night that it would be
cool if they put more descriptive hit messages in, like DR does. Instead of
47,000 "you hit a goblin for 48 damage" messages, you'd get "You strike a
crippling blow to the goblin's head, shearing off most of it's face!"

That would be cool.

Aranlas Starchaser
Retired Bard of Tunare

Aranya Steelheart
Knight of Tunare

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 11, 2000 1:32 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of


> >snip>
> I'd think you'd have to be
> absolutely nuts to want to pay $49.95/month. What was that all about? :-P
>
> ---Windleaf
> <snip<
>
> I wondered about that too? *boggle* Anyone remember DragonRealms besides
> me and Talies?
>
> My biggest gripe about Verant's misconceptions about Bards is that they
fail
> to realize that using no mana is equivalent to using mana less than one's
> mana regeneration rate.
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
